TrcCommonLib.trclib

Class TrcTrigger

  • java.lang.Object
    • TrcCommonLib.trclib.TrcTrigger
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    TrcDigitalInputTrigger

    public class TrcTrigger
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements a generic trigger mechanism. A generic trigger consists of an input method that will be called periodically to check if the trigger condition is met. If so, the trigger event notifier is called.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  TrcTrigger.Input
      This interface contains a method for checking if the trigger condition is met.
      static interface  TrcTrigger.Notifier
      This interface contains the method for the notifying a trigger event.
